summary: After narrowly escaping an ancient burial ground, a group of friends find themselves trapped between two evils, forcing them to fight, die, or go back the way they came.
cast: Kane Hodder|Lachlan Buchanan|Lauren Francesca|Jaclyn Swedberg|Puja Mohindra|Laura Jacobs|Stephanie Danielson|Bryce Draper|Gia Skova|Audra Van Hees|Grant Alan Ouzts|Ashley Green Elizabeth|Victoria Sophia|Leila Knight|Victoria Meincke|John S. DeSimone|Ashley Nicole Wallace|Eric Donnelly|Jacob Rowland Tate|Josh Diogo|Matt Perfetuo|Mike Perfetuo|Daniel Mascarello|Zack Roberts|Patrick Blanchette|Matthew R. Staley|Peter Hart
title: Muck
